fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Regional Policy, Food Safety, Digital economy and society
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Council of European Municipalities and Regions (CEMR); 
European Association for Local Democracy (ALDA)
goals__remit: Podupiranje razvijanja suradnje između županija te jedinica lokalne samouprave unutar njih, kao i usklađivanje gledišta i djelovanja članica u odnosu na tijela vlasti i uprave o pitanjima značajnim za razvoj područne (regionalne) samouprave. Hrvatska zajednica županija djeluje na području razvoja lokalne i područne (regionalne) samouprave.
